<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The .new store uses different resources than a normal store, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packetizer will not generate the .new if the regular store does not have</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This callback is invoked when a new block of instructions is about to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scheduled. The hazard state is set to an initialized state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonhazardrecognizer/#a03dfdba0cfd4c059df612490f566be10">Reset</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the hazard type of emitting this node.  There are three</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// possible results.  Either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; NoHazard: it is legal to issue this instruction on this cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; Hazard: issuing this instruction would stall the machine.  If some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     other instruction is available, issue it first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a9bec0e329b12bbc503d08db497d43267">HazardType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonhazardrecognizer/#aab1697feb9d87e4e53478bb751de708e">getHazardType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> stalls) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This callback is invoked when an instruction is emitted to be scheduled,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to advance the hazard state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonhazardrecognizer/#aafc82eb49e1de126caa8907eaca9f46e">EmitInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This callback may be invoked if getHazardType returns NoHazard. If, even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// though there is no hazard, it would be better to schedule another</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// available instruction, this callback should return true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonhazardrecognizer/#aa7aeeaeea47cbad621b11556e9b19839">ShouldPreferAnother</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This callback is invoked whenever the next top-down instruction to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scheduled cannot issue in the current cycle, either because of latency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// or resource conflicts.  This should increment the internal state of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hazard recognizer so that previously &quot;Hazard&quot; instructions will now not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// be hazards.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonhazardrecognizer/#a347f5f5d95a6de85d95f6af828378c9d">AdvanceCycle</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
